name: Exponential Tal
description:
Puzzle game where you will have to activate platforms to reach the end.

The energy increases exponentially every time you activate a platform which makes things difficult.

[This is the first video game I've made, I haven't calculated the development times well and I've also started very late so I haven't had time to put in all the ideas I had in mind but I'm still happy with the result ^^

I hope you enjoy it ^^]

GAME FOR BIG FESTIVE GAME JAM 2022

All assets created by me except sounds effects and credits music from freesound.org
